title: Malzahar name blocked (no profanity filter)
body:
Something weird is happening today.  A number of normal words are being blocked in my rune and items pages.

I do not have the profanity filter enabled.

I would include a screenshot, but your stupid boards don't allow that in any obvious way.

So, one example is I have an item page I named 'Malzahar'.  It displays as 'Mal*****' every time I try and access the item page.

Fix the issues.

And I now see that your boards only display a single 'star'.  There should be a 'star' for every letter in Malzahar's name.  God, you guys make even this simple process of reporting a bug difficult.

replies.body:
if you want to post an image such as a screen shot refer to this
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/esjzN2Q1-posting-images-and-gifs-on-the-boards
Reminds me of the Pokemon GTS blocking all Co%%%rigus trades back in Gen5.
it's because the champ is so hard cancer that it his name has to be censored
press PRT SCR, paste it into paint, upload it to imgur, and grab the image url
